title: Alex Villanueva and the False Promise of a Progressive Sheriff
description: Across the country, in both conservative and liberal communities, jails seem immune to change.
dc:creator: Robin Kaiser-Schatzlein
media:credit: Lauren Justice for The New York Times
media:description: Alex Villanueva, the sheriff of Los Angeles County, is an avowed reformist. But the jails he oversees seem immune to change.
